Littleton tenures in Englishe Tenures. English. 1556 Littleton, Thomas, Sir, d. 1481.
145 leaves.
By Richard Tottle, Imprinted at London in Fletestrete within Temple Barre, at the signe of the hande and Starre : the xvi. day of April the yere of our lord M.D.V.I. [1556]
Imprint from colophon. "Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum." Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of text. Signatures: A-S⁸, T¹. Reproduction of original in: Harvard University Library.
=======
Littleton tenures in Englishe Tenures. English. 1556 Littleton, Thomas, Sir, d. 1481.
145 leaves.
By Richard Tottle, Imprinted at London in Fletestrete within Temple Barre, at the signe of the hande and Starre : the xvi. day of April the yere of our lord M.D.V.I. [1556]
Imprint from colophon. "Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum." Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of text. Signatures: A-S⁸, T¹. Reproduction of original in: Harvard University Library.
Richard Tottle
